name: my-bookmarks
description: A web app to store our bookmarks

scripts.watch-app: node package/watchHtml.js & tsc --watch --project tsconfig.app.json & npx esbuild src/assets/ts/index.ts --bundle --outdir=dist/assets/js --watch & npx sass --watch src/assets/scss:dist/assets/css & node dist/index.js
scripts.build-app: node package/buildHtml.js && npx esbuild src/assets/ts/index.ts --bundle --outdir=dist/assets/js && tsc --project tsconfig.app.json && npx sass src/assets/scss:dist/assets/css
